extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Floris on 23-07-15. /////////////////////////////////////////////////// // What does this class do? // /////////////////////////////////////////////////// // This class is full with static // // methods and allows editing your teams! // /////////////////////////////////////////////////

    • Method Detail

      • setPublicSpawnpoint

        public static void setPublicSpawnpoint(Arena arena,
                                       org.bukkit.Location spawnpoint,
                                       int number)
        Sets the new public spawnpoint over all teams that have SpawnType.PUBLIC.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        spawnpoint - the new spawnpoint for all teams that have SpawnType.PUBLIC.
        number - The index number of the spawnpoint. Note: the counting starts at 1, not 0!

      • publicSpawnsMaximum

        public static int publicSpawnsMaximum(Arena arena)
        Gets the amount maximum amount of public spawns, used for synchronisation of public spawns.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        Returns:
        the maximum amounts of spawns or 0 when not found.

      • teamsInfo

        public static java.lang.String teamsInfo(java.util.List<Team> teams)
        Makes a string that contains all teams marked with their color. Red means it's not ready to be saved, green means it is ready!
        Parameters:
        teams - List of teams, I recommend you to use Arena.getTeams() method }
        Returns:
        String of all teams, separated with a comma (",").
